ClassDesc: Defines a camera move. An object of this type can be used to modify a map's camera by calling @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#animateCamera_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#animateCamera_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#moveCamera_E@. To obtain a @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#CameraUpdate_E@ use the factory class @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#CameraUpdateFactory_E@.
